content.prompt: The increased availability of goods that Tolstoy critiques in the passage led most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: The creation of a truly global economic network
The attempts by governments to regulate the business cycle
The development of mass-marketing through advertisements and new shopping venues
The increasing popularity of Marxist economic theory in tsarist Russia among the peasants
